price: 5. Tama hiimiy yalli elle xiibitet kas le numuh kaa xiqtah tan xiiba tanii? yeey, tanih.
arabic: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: hal fī dhālika qasamun lidhī ḥij'rin
